Name: Storm
Desc:
Orders all Ether Swords to create a blade storm around you. The number of illusions dealed a proportion of Ether Swords that are tracking enemies moves around you. Storm does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status and can be canceled by reusing the skill.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Gathering or higher

H.Old:
MP Cost: 500. For 14 sec., auto attacks up to 7 nearby enemies at 500% damage 2 times at regular intervals.
If more than one pair of Ether Swords are ordered while casting, increases attack count by 2 for each pair of swords.
Cooldown: 90 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 500. Periodically auto-attacks up to 7 nearby enemies at 500% Damage 2 times for 14 sec.
If more than 1 pair of Ether Swords are ordered at the time of casting, attack count +2 per excess Ether Sword pair.
Cooldown: 90 sec.
